description:
Aiden's girlfriend referred him to us, but only on the condition that he not do anything with another guy. Most of the time guys with girlfriends go ahead and do it anyway, but since 1) his girlfriend already knew what he was doing, and 2) he respects his girlfriend, no amount of begging from me has persuaded him to do otherwise.
However, Aiden has an ass that simply must be showcased. It's smooth, round, and muscular, with a nice stream of dark hair running up the crack. Fortunately, he was able to get his girlfriend's permission to come back and try some anal experimentation.
Aiden says he's never had anything up his ass. I got out the big toys and he said "no" (he's very persistent!) so we arranged a collection of more "manageable" anal probes and set him loose. Judging by the size of the load he blew, I think he enjoyed himself!
title: Aiden's Toys
